GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Provide a list of properties that meet the criteria given in the user input.

templateVersions.content:
You are going to provide a list of properties that meet the criteria given in the user input.
User Input Example: "Show me a list of houses in Boston with 3 beds and 1 bath."
Instructions: 1. Extract the city, number of bedrooms, and number of bathrooms from the user input. 2. Use the extracted criteria to query the input fields in the property object. 3. Return a list of properties that match the criteria.
Input Fields: - City: {!$Input:Property.City__c}{!$Input:Property.City__c} - Beds: {!$Input:Property.Beds__c} - Baths: {!$Input:Property.Baths__c}
Response Format: - Provide a concise list of properties in the format: "Property Name - Address - Beds: X, Baths: Y" - Include only the properties that match all criteria. - Do not include any extra information or explanation.
Example Response: 1. Maple House - 123 Main St, Boston - Beds: 3, Baths: 1 2. Oak Villa - 456 Elm St, Boston - Beds: 3, Baths: 1
